channel.title: Mobileapp on Xiaoyun Yang
channel.description: Recent content in Mobileapp on Xiaoyun Yang

item.title: Building A React Native Travel App
item.author: xiaoyun@looseleafapp.com (Xiaoyun Yang)
item.description: When I was planning my trip to Japan with some friends, I thought why not to use this opportunity to make a ReactNative mobile app to help you plan and execute your travel itinerary.

item.title: Creating NumberShapes: Math Learning Mobile Apps
item.author: xiaoyun@looseleafapp.com (Xiaoyun Yang)
item.description: NumberShapes is a collection of mobile apps that make numbers come alive through numerical visualizations and interactions. In 2014, I worked on the software development for the first few apps, which are iOS matching games that help young learners with familiarization of addition, subtraction, multiplication and other math facts.
